members.name: AuthCommon
members.returns: A LicenceFull class instance containing details of the attributes and permissions assigned to the account.
members.exception: Thrown if there is a login processing error.
members.remarks: A successful authentication causes the web service to register a session with the client. The Id of the session is recorded by the client class instance and is automatically added to subsequent service call request headers. The logout and return calls will end the session and remove the request header.

members.name: ThrowOnError
members.param: True to throw an if the standard response body property hasError value is true. Otherwise the caller must inspect the hasError property and perform their own error handling logic.
